newsitem.title: USA: West Marine April same-store sales fell.
newsitem.headline: West Marine April same-store sales fell.

text.p: West Marine Inc said Thursday that comparable store net sales for the four week period ended April 26 decreased 2.6 percent from the same period a year ago.
West Marine also said that net sales in April 1997 were $37.0 million, an increase of 45.7 percent from net sales of $25.4 million for the same period a year ago.
Comparable store net sales for the latest seventeen weeks increased 4.5 percent from the same period a year ago, the company said.
Net sales for the latest seventeen weeks were $112.0 million, an increase of 48.7 percent from sales of $75.3 million for the seventeen week period a year ago, the company said.
